titles.title: A resolution thanking Joyce Rechtschaffen for her service to the Senate and to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
A resolution thanking Joyce Rechtschaffen for her service to the Senate and to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: Thanks Joyce Rechtschaffen for her years of work for and dedication to the Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
